name: game-of-life
full_name: GoL2-Contract - Game of Life on StarkNet
description: A StarkNet implementation of Conway's Game of Life written in Cairo, with an interactive element where players can alter the state of the game and affect the future of the simulation.
features: Conway's Game of Life implementation on StarkNet
Two game modes: Infinite and Creator
Credit token system for game interactions
Efficient game state packing into single felt
Wrapping boundaries for infinite grid simulation

contracts.description: Cairo smart contracts implementing Game of Life logic and ERC20 token

indexer.description: TypeScript-based indexer for Game of Life contract events

utils.description: Helper functions, constants, and events for contract

dependencies.cairo-lang: Required for Cairo compilation and deployment

infinite_game_genesis.description: The genesis state for the game in infinite mode, also used as game_id. This is the packed representation of the 'acorn' pattern - a methuselah that takes 5206 generations to stabilize.
